alert.note: Alert for Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 9:07PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ziebach County through 945 PM MDT... At 907 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Arrow Head Buttes to 3 miles southwest of Bridger. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Iron Lightning around 915 PM MDT. Takini around 920 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Thunder Butte and Cherry Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
